trend_summary: Across the image sequence, scattered villages expand slightly along main roads, but cropland still dominates. Minor industrial sheds and a new connector road appear, while some peripheral forests are cleared and hedgerows thicken elsewhere. Overall settlement remains sparse and rural with only gradual, localized growth.
notable_changes: Small housing clusters extend from village cores, especially along the central north-south road.
New light-industrial or storage buildings emerge on eastern outskirts.
Connector/bypass road added, realigning traffic around the central settlement.
Patchy forest clearing in the south-east converts to larger crop fields.
Increased tree lines and hedgerows mark modest greening between fields.
